properties.name: output.csv.path
properties.description: The relative or absolute location of the CSV file

properties.name: output.csv.filename
properties.description: The filename of the CSV output file

properties.name: output.csv.delimiter
properties.description: The column separator to use in the CSV file

properties.name: output.csv.quote
properties.description: The quote character to surround column values with, can be empty.

properties.name: output.csv.enable
properties.description: Set to true to enable the CSV file output.

properties.name: input.period
properties.description: The refresh rate for fetching data from devices in seconds.

properties.name: input.devices
properties.description: The list of all devices to fetch and collect data from.

properties.name: input.timeout
properties.description: The HTTP connection timeout in seconds when fetching data from a device
